name: Woocommerce Wholesale Manager
author: Feroz Jaffer

sections.description:
Check official website for live demo http://www.bilogicit.com/woo-wholesale-manager/

Live Demo

username : demo
password : demo

Add Wholesale functionality to your woocommerce store easily.

Checkout our PRO Version

  • Compatible with IE, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Chrome
  • Compatible with WooCommerce 2.1.x, WooCommerce 2.0.x
  • Allot Wholesale input field for all Simple and Variable Products
  • Set Minimum Quantity Per Product
  • Set Maxmimum Quantity Per Product
  • Set Minimum Cart Quantity to Checkout
  • Set Minimum Cart Amount to Checkout
  • Automatically Creates Wholesale Role
  • Show Regular Price, Wholesale Price
  • Show Amount Saves, Show Percentage Saves
  • Works with Simple and Variable Products

PRO Version Demo

  • Easy installation.
  • Easy configuration.
  • Easy admin option.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Find Woo Wholesale Manager option under dashboard menu.
sections.faq:
Q2. How to assign wholesale pricing to any role?
